mapper.insert: insert into ADMIN_VISUAL(img_num, movie_title, img_url) values(#{img_num}, #{movie_title}, #{img_url})
mapper.update: update ADMIN_VISUAL set movie_title=#{movie_title}, img_url=#{img_url} where img_num = #{img_num}
mapper.select: select * from ADMIN_VISUAL where img_num > 0 order by img_num desc
